summary: Because the veins all over the place are just... gross.
descriptionHtml:
====================================
MALE BODY VEIN REMOVAL
====================================
Author: MadCat221 (MadCat221@gmail.com)

Version: 1.0

December 14, 2011

1. Introduction
2. Version History

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

After one view too many of the veins all over the male body textures, I decided I had enough of being grossed out by them.  This is Skyrim!  Even a modicum of body fat is mandatory!

So I scrubbed them off with Heal/Spot Heal in Photoshop, and also buffed out with the blur tool a few of the annoying pixellated normal map bake artifacts that the devs couldn\'t be arsed to fix before packing.

==================
2. VERSION HISTORY
==================

v1: 
Initial Release.
author: MadCat221
